song_lyrics: Santankī sobat se hovat, ati prīti Avināshī se,
Sāchī bāt kahī chhoḍāvta, kāl māyā kī pās se.
Mat kar moh tu, haribhajanko mān re... °ṭek
Nayan diye darshan karneko, shravaṇ diye sun gyān re... ° 1
Badan diyā Hari gun gāneko, hāth diye kar dān re... ° 2
Kahat Kabīr suno bhāī sādho, kanchan nipjat khān re... ° 3
title: Mat kar moh tu haribhajanko mān re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-309: Kabirdas

Category: Anya Hindi Pad
